remarks: The set of all subspaces of a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspval.g $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
sspval.s $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
sspval.n $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
sspval.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspval $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> H = { w e. NrmCVec | ( ( +v ` w ) C_ G /\ ( .sOLD ` w ) C_ S /\ ( normCV ` w ) C_ N ) } ) $.
$d G w $.
$d N w $.
$d S w $.
$d U w $.
